description:
Kagome and the others are kidnapped by demons who are using fake Sacred Jewels. Inuyasha and the rest go to save them, but Gyuoh stands in their way.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El creador de la perla de Shikon (2ª parte)
Os criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas (Parte 2)
Shikon no Tama o Tsukuru Mono (Kouhen)
The Sacred Jewel Maker Part II
四魂の玉を造る者 (後編)
